trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) makes a fist and punches towards you\, releasing a blast of pure elemental energy that slams into you\, searing your flesh\.$
trigger.name: elementalism_blast__

trigger.match: ^You are scorched by the firewall as you pass through\.$
trigger.name: elementalism_firewall__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) raises a hand towards you and blasts you with cold\, frigid air\.$
trigger.name: elementalism_freeze__

trigger.match: ^(?:An icewall rises up|[A-Z][a-z]+ raises [hH](?:is|er) hands dramatically\, and summons an icewall) to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: elementalism_icewall__

trigger.match: ^Pointing at you\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) hisses and narrows [hH](?:is|er) eyes\. Flames erupt on your skin\, blistering your flesh\.$
trigger.name: elementalism_ignite__
